components/common/minibc-template-variab:
<!-- MiniBC Template Variables -->
<script type="text/javascript">
    window.BC_TPL_VARS = {
        customer: {
            'id':           '{{customer.id}}',
            'email':   '{{customer.email}}',
            'first_name':	'{{customer.shipping_address.first_name}}',
            'last_name':	'{{customer.shipping_address.last_name}}',
            'group': {
                'id':  '{{customer.customer_group_id}}',
                'name': '{{customer.customer_group_name}}'
            }
        },
        
        category: {
            id: (!isNaN(parseInt('{{category.id}}'))) ? parseInt('{{category.id}}') : false,
            url: '{{category.url}}'
        },
        product: {
            id: (!isNaN(parseInt('{{ product.id }}'))) ? parseInt('{{product.id}}') : false,
            name: "{{product.title}}",
            sku: "{{product.sku}}"
        }
    };
</script>
